name: Cloudfall
description:
Description:
Clouds never made the most stable platforms. How high can you go? 
Although the game has no true ending due to time constraints, if you get to 500 points you can consider yourself a winner and the Top Crow!

Jam Details:
This game was made in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 49 Compo in October of 2021. The theme of the jam was "Unstable."
